input_info.description: Contains information about avatar input handling

steep_slope_movement.description: Contains information about avatar movement in steep slopes

action_slide_movement_info.description: Contains information about the avatar action slide

climb_info.description: Contains information about avatar climbing behaviour

short_throw_info.description: Contains information about throwing stuff underhard.

long_throw_info.description: Contains information about throwing stuff overhand.

detection_info.description: Contains information about stealth and being detected.

weathering_settings.description: Contains information about how fast dirt and wear and tear is added to the avatar.

movement_haptics.description: Contains information about the avatar's movement haptics.

exertion_levels.description: The different levels of exertion levels.

heal_self_duration.description: The duration in seconds it takes to heal yourself.

heal_self_decay_wait_time.description: The duration in seconds to wait before starting to decaying healing progress.

heal_self_decay_rate.description: The rate at which your healing progress decays if not healing.

heal_self_cancle_damage_amount.description: The amount of damage you take for cancle healing.

ragdoll_damage_velocity_lower.description: The lower value at which our limbs deal ragdoll damage.

ragdoll_damage_velocity_upper.description: The upper value at which our limbs deal ragdoll damage.

ragdoll_damage_min.description: The lowest amount of ragdoll damage we deal.

ragdoll_damage_max.description: The highest amount of ragdoll damage we deal.

ragdoll_damage_snow_modifier.description: The modifier which we decrease ragdomm damage in snow by.

min_aim_duration.description: Time it takes to aim at max ergonomics level

max_aim_duration.description: Time it takes to aim at min ergonomics level

min_fire_ready_duration.description: Time it takes to get ready to fire a shot at max ergonomics level

max_fire_ready_duration.description: Time it takes to get ready to fire a shot at min ergonomics level

taunt_time_before_drain.description: Time it takes for the taunt probability to start draining

taunt_drain_per_second.description: How much of the taunt probability we drain per second

taunt_on_trigger_probability_mul.description: By how much do we multiply the probability upon a successful taunt?
